name: Vita-Rich Bisque
description: Sweet potatoes, pumpkins, and squash are great sources of vitamin A (beta-carotene) and vitamin C, powerful antioxidants that protect your body’s cells from damage.

ingredients.name: partly-skimmed evaporated milk or coconut milk

preparation: In a large pot, combine sweet potatoes, broth, and spice over high heat for approximately 15 min.
In a food processor, purée until smooth, adding enough reserved broth mixture for desired thickness. Add brown sugar.  Season to taste and pulse to combine.
Add evaporated milk and tea. Pulse to incorporate and serve in bowls.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with (or add to soup) 1 serving lean protein and 1⁄2 cup veggies.

products.name: Vegetable Broth Mix
summary: Make a tasty vegetable broth in a matter of seconds! Same garden-fresh flavour as making it from scratch—just add water!

products.name: Apple Pie Spice
summary: Move over pumpkin spice; it's time for Apple Pie Spice to shine! Perfect for leveling up the taste of fall-inspired baking, it's also great on top of oatmeal, in a frothy late or smoothie – or anywhere you want a punch of apple pie flavour.
